subject: Add error handling and quality improvements
body:
- Add global error handlers (window.onerror, onunhandledrejection) in app.js
- Wrap app initialization in try-catch with user-friendly error display
- Add safeGetElement() and safeRenderChart() helpers in charts/index.js
- Refactor all 18 chart rendering calls to use null-safe helpers
- Add defensive null/NaN checks to formatCurrency, formatPercentage, formatNumber
- Update HISTORY.md with quality improvements documentation
title: Add error handling and quality improvements
